pages.text: Oh no! This mod does not provide iron doors, iron trap doors or iron fence gates, $(#333)(wait is this even a thing?)$() how am I supposed to secure my base against evildoers, rogues and pranksters? Well, luckily there is a simple method to lock doors, trapdoors and fence gates. Just right-click a door (for example) with an iron ingot. Right-click again to unlock the block.

The iron ingot $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process! However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. You cannot lock an empty frame. This feature is supported by frame and illusion doors, trapdoors and fence gates.

To further secure your base, you can make those blocks immune to redstone signals. For this, right-click a door (for example) with a piece of redstone dust. The signal can be as strong as it wants, the door does not care anymore! Right-click again to make the block sensitive to redstone signals again. The redstone dust $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process!

However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. You cannot make an empty frame ignore redstone signals. This feature is supported by frame and illusion doors, trapdoors and fence gates.
